comments:
Build: I20050927-0800

I tried to immediately switching to a perspective containing the synchronize
view after startup.  It froze for several seconds while the "Initializing Java
tooling" job was running, and then the perspective opened with the following NPE
in the synchronize view:

Created an attachment (id=27784)
Log file

Yikes, the log file has race condition errors... we can look into this
tomorrow.

I looked at the CVSUI startup code and we are doing a couple of things that 
look suspicious. We create a console and start the change set event handler. 
We'll have to profile a startup and see if we can reprodice this. We should 
also look in the two calls I mentioed to see if a lock is being obtained.
This is in the old sync participant which will be removed in 3.3.
